episodes.title: Run from the MLM Side Hustle. Lose Money & Join a Cult
episodes.description:
“Money isn’t just for paying bills. It’s a tool to build a life you love!” - Eva 

Most finance gurus give advice from a distance and promote extreme advice —like they’ve never actually struggled with money. But I’m not just talking theory—I’m living it. I’ve been through debt before, got out of it, and then life happened again. After being unemployed for two years, I found myself starting over again. 

If you’re tired of being shamed for your financial struggles, you’re in the right place. I know what it’s like to juggle bills, deal with financial stress, and try to fix your money without the luxury of a six-figure income. My advice isn’t about perfection—it’s about real, doable steps that actually work for normal people. 

📌 Subscribe for real-world finance advice without the judgment😊 

We focus on practical, everyday strategies for getting out of debt and achieving financial stability. Here you will find down-to-earth advice that you can actually implement in your daily life. Whether you’re looking for budgeting tips, debt management strategies, or ways to improve your financial health without going to extremes, you’re in the right place! 

Subscribe to the channel for real-world tips and support as you work towards financial freedom. 💡💰 

My other channel; https://www.youtube.com/@EvasLifeEditProject
